description: Structured information on a file instance that is accessible via a URL.
label: File
name: File

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/IRI._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) to this file instance.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/IRI.description: Stands for Internationalized Resource Identifier which is an internet protocol standard that builds on the URI protocol, extending the set of permitted characters to include Unicode/ISO 10646.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/IRI.label: Iri
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/IRI.name: IRI

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/conte._instruction: Enter a short content description for this file instance.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/conte.label: Content description
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/conte.name: contentDescription

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/dataT._instruction: Add all data types that are specifically represented in this file instance.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/dataT.label: Data type
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/dataT.name: dataType

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fileR._instruction: Add the overarching repository to which this file instance belongs.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fileR.label: File repository
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fileR.name: fileRepository

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/forma._instruction: Add the content type of this file instance.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/forma.description: Method of digitally organizing and structuring data or information.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/forma.label: Format
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/forma.name: format

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hash._instruction: Add all hashes that were generated for this file instance.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hash.description: Term used for the process of converting any data into a single value. Often also directly refers to the resulting single value.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hash.label: Hash
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hash.name: hash

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isPar._instruction: Add all file bundles in which this file instance is grouped into.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isPar.description: Reference to the ensemble of multiple things or beings.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isPar.label: Is part of
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isPar.name: isPartOf

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name._instruction: Enter the name of this file instance.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.label: Name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.name: name

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/speci._instruction: Add the special usage role of this file instance.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/speci.description: Particular function of something when it is used.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/speci.label: Special usage role
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/speci.name: specialUsageRole

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/stora._instruction: Enter the storage size of this file instance.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/stora.description: Quantitative value defining how much disk space is used by an object on a computer system.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/stora.label: Storage size
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/stora.name: storageSize
